title: Kylie Jenner and Travis Scott featured in Playboy
text:
(CNN) Get ready to see a lot more of Kylie Jenner.

On Tuesday, Playboy tweeted a photo of an apparently nude Jenner (wearing a cowboy hat) embracing a shirtless Travis Scott.

"@kyliejenner and @trvisXX coming to Playboy," the tweet reads, along with a link to the magazine's Fall 2019 issue -- dubbed "The Pleasure Issue."

"It is a celebration of the things that bring us joy: sex, art, food, music, spiritual connection, travel, cannabis and community. And did we mention sex?" the description reads. "In this issue, we aren't only showcasing the artists and creators who bring us joy; we're also shining a light on visionaries and revolutionaries who are fighting to expand access to pleasure for all."

According to Playboy, the cover featuring Jenner was shot by Sasha Samsonova, and Scott was the creative director.

Read More
description: Get ready to see a lot more of Kylie Jenner.
